snippet: My bedroom has worn carpet. Should I replace it with a hardwood flooring before trying to sell my home?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A offers advice to homeowners on whether to replace worn carpeting in the bedroom with hardwood flooring before trying to sell a home.
lead_paragraph: My bedroom has worn carpet. Should I replace it with a hardwood flooring before trying to sell my home?

headline.seo: Replacing Carpeting Before a Sale — Market Ready
